s2d.geom

Class AABB2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • s2d.geom.AABB2D

  • public class AABB2D
extends java.lang.Object
    An axis-aligned bounding block that can handle collisions.
    Since:
    1.0

      • AABB2D

        public AABB2D(double x,
              double y,
              double w,
              double h)
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate of the top left corner of the box.

        w - The width of the box
        h - The height of the box.

    • Method Detail

      • sweptCollision

        public static Vec sweptCollision(AABB2D box,
                                 java.util.List<AABB2D> staticBox,
                                 Vec velocity)
        Returns the new position of a an AABB2D after having interacted with a list of other AABB2D.
        Parameters:
        box - The moving AABB2D
        staticBox - A List of all of the static walls that are to be collided with.
        velocity - The velocity of the moving box
        Returns:
        the new position of the AABB2D (box).

      • getBounds

        public Vec getPosition()
        Returns:
        The position Vec of the top left corner of the box.

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(double x,
                        double y)
        Sets the location of the box.
        Parameters:
        x - The new x-coordinate of the top left corner of the box.
        y - The new y-coordinate of the top left corner of the box.
